basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

education.institution: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

awards.title: National Science Foundation Geopaths - Impact (GP-IMPACT)
awards.summary: Participate in the Student Undergraduate Research Fair (SURF) at the end of the semester of the award by presenting research, Volunteer to help organize SURF, Volunteer to help organize the STEM Expo, Perform any additional duties from the faculty mentor

awards.title: Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society
awards.summary: From Wikipedia- Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society (ΦΘΚ or PTK) is the international honor society of students attending open-access institutions and seeking associate degrees, bachelor's degrees, or other college credentials.
